alert.note: Alert for Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 3:12PM EDT until May 15 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 312 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tallahassee, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida State University, Florida A and M, Tallahassee Community College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Macon Community Park, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Walker Ford Community Center, South City, Griffin Heights, Lake Ella, Callen Neighborhood, Tallahassee Regional A/P, State Capital Complex, Governors Square Mall, Midtown and Springsax Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
